trans-unit.source:
\n

Exposes instance methods for creating, moving, and enumerating through directories and subdirectories.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx$ xxxxxx$ xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
This class cannot be inherited.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

\n

\npath is null.

\n

The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx$ xxxx xxxx$ xx xxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxx$xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters, and file names must be less than 260 characters.

trans-unit.source:
